channel.title: Impact | Revolutionizing Private Servers
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://www.impact-rs.com/forums/public/style_images/8_impactlogo.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][URL=http://"http://www.impact-rs.com/"]Home[/URL] || [URL=http://"http://www.impact-rs.com/forums/"]Forums[/URL] | | [URL=http://"http://www.impact-rs.com/play/index.html"]Play[/URL] | | [URL=http://"http://www.impact-rs.com/vote"]Vote[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Information[/U][/FONT][/SIZE] Impact is a Runescape private server that has been in development for the past few years by passionate and motivated developers. Our goal is to provide an enjoyable private server experience for all types of players, surpassing the typical expectations. We know that this whole thing wouldn't work without you, the players, which is why we urge you to express your thoughts on the server and forum! What do you like? What don't you like? What would you like to see more of? And more importantly, what new content would you like to see? Your opinion is extremely valuable to us and will determine the focus our future updates.
[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Features[/U][/FONT][/SIZE] Well maintained community Active community only six days after release ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5uVT/8070a434fd.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5qDG/a6c733f37f.png"]Pic[/URL]) Constant updates Custom donation page integrated with the forums ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5qtC/5aef753523.png]Pic[/URL]) Client with the ability to choose your gameplay ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5qRp/bfe9b33f7b.png]Pic[/URL]) Over 10 settings to toggle within the client Quest, Player, and achievements tabs all fully functionally Well put together teleportation system Clan chat system Shooting stars Full screen Bank tabs Over 7 minigames to enjoy with friends or your self (Pest control, warriors guild, barrows, duel arena and more) Over 7 bosses to challenge (Corp, Barrelchest, Kbd, Kq and more) Over 5 dungeons with monsters to be slain Vote system Great xp rates to keep players entertained Iron man mode with proper interface
[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Skills[/U][/FONT][/SIZE] Combat related skills Fletching ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xEO/3963e3d23f.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5xGS/8d7a887fcb.png]Pic[/URL]) Woodcutting ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xJy/7c60757ffe.png]Pic[/URL]) Firemaking ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xMT/8e1896bbcf.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xLj/b6a9d2eb4a.png"]Pic[/URL]) Fishing ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xRB/e27085c798.png]Pic[/URL]) Cooking ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xVU/82e650389b.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5xXU/a5820a8889.png]Pic[/URL]) Mining ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5ypI/8e546a47dc.png]Pic[/URL]) Smithing ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5yAN/b2f4ee9021.png]Pic[/URL] Herblore ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5z8v/60f19a513f.png]Pic[/URL] Agility ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5zf2/fb9d67d043.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5sSD/090981bc16.png]Pic[/URL]) Farming Runecrafting Crafting ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5yfU/1b5799c3a6.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5ycZ/2d95f10acc.png]Pic[/URL] Thieving ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5zjh/32448a8497.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5ziY/131ac995a2.png]Pic[/URL])
[SPOILER=General Media] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5t3Q/03ce8c648c.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5rOx/9867cafe97.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5rDF/abe64b28d1.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5rVP/9614298e6b.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5sfj/d571093215.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5sDb/aba88aa27c.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5r3v/cb33919b59.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5sno/d6b07d4248.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5t1a/3382d85e6d.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5ra1/1f277abd18.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Player Media] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/29e0pat.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/25ksktk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/kd7hmw.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
More media to come [/CENTER]

item.title: Impact | Revolutionizing Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“angelfallen, post:5, topic:550959”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=669873.msg4479272#msg4479272 date=1428510976]

Server advertisements must be posted by the server’s owner only. Do not create an advertisement thread if you do not own the server!

[/quote]

Did i not just state it was copied from a player made advert. Get your wannabe mod ass off my thread.[/quote]

Don’t care, you’re not allowed to post this if it isn’t yours. I’m not a wannabe mod lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Impact | Revolutionizing Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen
item.description:
@angelfallen wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=4][URL=http://“http://www.impact-rs.com/”]Home[/URL] || [URL=http://“http://www.impact-rs.com/forums/”]Forums[/URL] | | [URL=http://“http://www.impact-rs.com/play/index.html”]Play[/URL] | | [URL=http://“http://www.impact-rs.com/vote”]Vote[/URL][/SIZE]

[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Information[/U][/FONT][/SIZE]
Impact is a Runescape private server that has been in development for the past few years by passionate and motivated developers. Our goal is to provide an enjoyable private server experience for all types of players, surpassing the typical expectations. We know that this whole thing wouldn’t work without you, the players, which is why we urge you to express your thoughts on the server and forum! What do you like? What don’t you like? What would you like to see more of? And more importantly, what new content would you like to see? Your opinion is extremely valuable to us and will determine the focus our future updates.

[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Features[/U][/FONT][/SIZE]
Well maintained community
Active community only six days after release ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5uVT/8070a434fd.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5qDG/a6c733f37f.png”]Pic[/URL])
Constant updates
Custom donation page integrated with the forums ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5qtC/5aef753523.png]Pic[/URL])
Client with the ability to choose your gameplay ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5qRp/bfe9b33f7b.png]Pic[/URL])
Over 10 settings to toggle within the client
Quest, Player, and achievements tabs all fully functionally
Well put together teleportation system
Clan chat system
Shooting stars
Full screen
Bank tabs
Over 7 minigames to enjoy with friends or your self (Pest control, warriors guild, barrows, duel arena and more)
Over 7 bosses to challenge (Corp, Barrelchest, Kbd, Kq and more)
Over 5 dungeons with monsters to be slain
Vote system
Great xp rates to keep players entertained
Iron man mode with proper interface

[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Skills[/U][/FONT][/SIZE]
Combat related skills
Fletching ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xEO/3963e3d23f.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5xGS/8d7a887fcb.png]Pic[/URL])
Woodcutting ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xJy/7c60757ffe.png]Pic[/URL])
Firemaking ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xMT/8e1896bbcf.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xLj/b6a9d2eb4a.png”]Pic[/URL])
Fishing ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xRB/e27085c798.png]Pic[/URL])
Cooking ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5xVU/82e650389b.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5xXU/a5820a8889.png]Pic[/URL])
Mining ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5ypI/8e546a47dc.png]Pic[/URL])
Smithing ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5yAN/b2f4ee9021.png]Pic[/URL]
Herblore ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5z8v/60f19a513f.png]Pic[/URL]
Agility ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5zf2/fb9d67d043.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5sSD/090981bc16.png]Pic[/URL])
Farming
Runecrafting
Crafting ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5yfU/1b5799c3a6.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5ycZ/2d95f10acc.png]Pic[/URL]
Thieving ([URL=http://puu.sh/h5zjh/32448a8497.png]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://puu.sh/h5ziY/131ac995a2.png]Pic[/URL])

[SPOILER=General Media]










[/SPOILER]

More media to come
[/CENTER]
